name: Space Sweeper (kknn)
description:
An era when mankind began to spread to multiple star systems.

Companies that purify the environment of the planet and allow human beings to live have been born one after another and have grown rapidly.

The work of these companies is to clean up harmful creatures, broken and dangerous robots, radioactivity, etc.,  and "clean up" to a state where humans can migrate.
Depending on the environment of the planet, a huge amount of material is required for cleanup. 
However, we can not transport all the necessary materials with rockets, so we need to find resources that can be used in the field. To that end, it may be necessary to develop new technology.

"Space Sweeper Inc." is one such fast-growing start-up company.

You headed for a new site as a member of Space Sweeper.

The next site seems to be filled with dangerous living things and robots than ever.
It may be impossible to clean everything with the power of only one person...

-----

SpaceSweeper is a multiplayer shooting action game.

You will destroy countless dangerous creatures and enemy planes that fill a vast map.
In order to expand your territory, the player explores the map, mine the ore such as iron and rare earth,
craft tools and weapons, construction of road network, electric grid and defense system.
To destroy the final enemy's fortress, you need advanced teamwork.

-----
